Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Forest Preserve
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Forest Preserve, Addison, and Cumberland due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Forest Preserve.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Forest Preserve, Addison, and Cumberland due to, street blockage at Irving Park/Forest Preserve.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Western
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Western due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Western due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
